SEARCH

Package views

package views
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountsView
    The AccountsView class inherits from BaseView and is a view interface used to display account-related information.
    AddTransactionDialog
    A custom dialog window used for adding new transaction details.
    BaseView
    BaseView is an abstract class that extends JPanel and serves as the base class for all views in the application.
    BucksBrainAIChatView
    BucksBrainAIChatView is a view class implementing an intelligent assistant chat interface.
    CreditCardsView
    The CreditCardsView class extends BaseView and provides a view interface for displaying credit card-related information.
    CurrencySettingViewPanel
    A JPanel that provides a user interface for currency conversion settings.
    DashboardView
    Defines the DashboardView class, which extends BaseView and is used to display the dashboard view.
    EditTransactionDialog
    A dialog for editing transaction information.
    InvestmentsView
    A view class extending BaseView used to display investment-related information.
    PrivacySettingsPanel
    A JPanel that provides user interface components for configuring privacy settings.
    SettingsView
    SettingsView extends BaseView to create the settings interface.
    TransactionsView
    The TransactionsView class extends BaseView to display the transactions view interface.
